meanings.definition: The quality of being easy to approach or talk to.
meanings.sent1: Her approachability made it simple for everyone to talk to her.
meanings.sent2: His friendly smile and open body language showed his approachability.
meanings.sent3: The approachability of the robot made it the life of the party.
meanings.sent4: The approachability of the mountain seemed to invite climbers to conquer its peak.
meanings.sent5: The approachability of the concept was like a bright light in a dark room.

meanings.definition: The act of coming near or closer to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The approachability of the finish line motivated the runners to sprint faster.
meanings.sent2: The approachability of the deadline made everyone work more efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The approachability of the cat to the mouse was quite unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The approachability of the storm made everyone seek shelter quickly.
meanings.sent5: The approachability of the treasure chest tempted the adventurers to explore further.
